text: Headset may refer to: * Headset (audio), audio headphone(s), particularly with an attached microphone. * VR headset, a set that all-in-one includes the audio headphones, the microphone and a virtual-reality device. * Headset (bicycle part), a bicycle part that connects the fork to the frame. * Head-mounted display, a video display mounted on a head strap or helmet. * Head Set (band), an American alternative rock band. * Headset, an electronica / hip-hop group of Dntel. ==See also== * Handset
title: Headset
